alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 3:05PM EST until January 29 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches for a storm total of 2 to 4 inches, locally up to 5 inches. * WHERE...Central Somerset County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Low pressure will bring a period of light snowfall to the region. Although snowfall amounts will be light, travel will still be impacted due to snowfall accumulations on untreated roads. Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause slick driving conditions due to snow covered roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
